contents: Article 1 (Purpose) This corporation operates the student loan support system efficiently in accordance with the Act on the Establishment of the Korea Scholarship Foundation and the Special Act on Student Loan Repayment after Employment, enabling anyone to pursue higher education according to their will and ability, regardless of economic conditions. The purpose is to contribute to the development of talent needed by the country and society by supporting opportunities. Revised 2019. 7. 11.
